messages.message: Hi, if i customer has their own OCR engine that they use that we don’t have on the platform, is it possible / how hard would it be to add this to IB?

Thanks Hari
• They currently use Adlib - https://www.adlibsoftware.com/capabilities/pdf-ocr. I haven’t validated if this works better than any OCR engines that are currently on the platform.
• I haven’t found an advantage yet. I’ll check with them why this is important. I’m hoping that if we demo our OCR engines are better that is fine.
